name: Name of your experiment
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.

name: Week 1: Randomized squares
description: This drawing is inspired by Vera Molnar. It is a grid drawing with squares that contain random lines. I got help from the coding examples in the lectures.

name: Week 1: Randomized squares
description: This is another variation of the squares. I added the element of random moving lines within each square.

name: Week 1: Randomized squares
description: This is a colored variation of the squares. I used HSB to make them pastel colored.
